# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x     | :white_check_mark: |
| 0.x     | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security vulnerabilities to: security@bates-solutions.com

**Do NOT open a public issue for security vulnerabilities.**

We will respond within 48 hours and work with you to understand and resolve the issue.

### What to Include
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

### Recognition
We credit security researchers who responsibly disclose vulnerabilities.
